/usr/bin/g++    -g -std=gnu++11 -I../src -I../src/input -I../src/graphics -I../src/graphics/buffers -I../src/mathLibs -I../src/utils -lGL -lGLEW -lglfw   -lGL -lGLEW -lglfw CMakeFiles/main.dir/src/main.o CMakeFiles/main.dir/src/graphics/window.o CMakeFiles/main.dir/src/graphics/shader.o CMakeFiles/main.dir/src/graphics/buffers/buffer.o CMakeFiles/main.dir/src/graphics/buffers/indexbuffer.o CMakeFiles/main.dir/src/graphics/buffers/vertexarray.o CMakeFiles/main.dir/src/graphics/simple2Drenderer.o CMakeFiles/main.dir/src/input/input.o CMakeFiles/main.dir/src/mathLibs/mathLib.o  -o bin/main -rdynamic -lGL -lGLEW -lglfw -lc
